Name: Major Meowbyte
Description: Hailing from the digital battlefields of the WebtrES club, Major Meowbyte is a feline force to be reckoned with. Clad in his pixelated soldier attire, he stands tall with a fierce red and black screen-face that glows with the intensity of a warrior. His arms and legs are well-versed in the art of digital combat, reflecting years of experience in strategic maneuvers and cyber skirmishes. Don't let his charming cat box exterior fool you; Major Meowbyte is a decorated hero in the virtual world, always ready to lead his battalion of bytes into the next online engagement. With every click and command, he ensures the safety and security of the WebtrES realm, one pixel at a time.
